Title: Assistant Professor Trombone
Notes: D.M.A. University of Cincinnati College-Conservatory of Music. Principal Trombonist of Huntington Symphony Orchestra. Active jazz and classical performer.

Title: Instructor Ensembles and Conducting - Director of Orchestral Studies
Notes: BM Curtis Institute of Music MM Temple University. Studied trombone with Glenn Dodson and Eric Carlson. Former Dean at Curtis Institute of Music.
